Review Text: Very nice staff. Delicious food. Good understanding in meat, recommended a very nice combo for our steak including a sauce and beer I would never have chosen myself. Also some very good Bitterballen for our starter. Great local dish.

Name: Caf√© Carb√≤n
Review Text: Fantastic service (rare in Amsterdam). Delicious food. These guys know their meat - good variety of stakes (both origin and cut) excellently prepared. Cosy and comfortable. Deserts will satisfy the sweet tooth.

Name: Caf√© Carb√≤n
Review Text: Enjoyed another A+++ steak meal at Cafe Carbon Jordaan! The steaks, chimichurri, pepper sauce and steak frites were all fantastic! Topped it off with Sticky Toffee Pudding and Chocolate Cheesecake totally yummie :)

Name: Caf√© Carb√≤n
Review Text: This was such a good place to eat a really nice steak in Amsterdam. The wine was paired perfectly for the Black Angus Ribeye and the staff we're friendly. Unfortunately it took them an hour to get our booked table ready for us, and for the menues to come. But the food and atmosphere still made up for the wait.

Name: Caf√© Carb√≤n
Review Text: Fantastic food, quality meat and service! We ordered the tenderloin steak and New Zealand Lamb. Was Amazing!

Name: Caf√© Carb√≤n
Review Text: One of our favourite restaurants in Amsterdam serving great quality grilled meat. The spicy ribs are wonderful! Indeed, it is our go to place for ribs in Amsterdam. We had a not so good experience with one of the waiting staff one evening and there is not a tremendous variety of draft beer, in my opinion, so down to four stars.
